Sustainability 
at AltraAltra has long been committed to 
sustainable practices across our business  
and we are proud to publish our first 
Sustainability Report to share deeper 
insights into Altra’s sustainability journey.
In our inaugural Sustainability Report, we have 
included an overview of our sustainability 
strategy, the topics we have identified as 
most material to Altra’s business through a 
2021 materiality assessment, highlights of 
our achievements over the preceding years 
and a glimpse into Altra’s path forward. 
The topics in this report are organized 
around our four Sustainability Pillars—
Innovation, Environment, Teamwork, 
and Integrity—directly aligned to our
